name: HomegearI2c::read
shortDescription: Reads data from an I²C device
description: This method reads data from an I²C device that was previously opened with HomegearI2c::open().

parameters.name: handle
parameters.description: The file pointer resource returned by HomegearI2c::open()

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: The number of bytes to read.

parameters.name: returnBinary
parameters.description: Returns raw binary data instead of hexadecimal string

returnValue: Returns the read hexadecimal string in successful or raw binary data if "returnBinary" is set to "true".
